project_descr: Projet de recherche à base communautaire avec comme objectif l’atteinte des 8 OMD dans les autres villages de la Communauté Rurale de Léona

donor_name: MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL, FUNDS FOR THE MILLENNIUM PROMISE VILLAGES PROJECT("MV2s"), INITIATED IN PARTNERSHIP WITH COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY'S EARTH INSTITUTE, THE UN MILLENNIUM PRIJECT AND UNDP. FUNDS ARE PROVIDED BY INFIVIDUAL PRIVATE DONORS VIA MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL. MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL IS THE EXECUTING AGENT FOR THIS PROJECT.

outputs.output_descr: Il s'agit d'un projet de développement dont l'objectif principal est l'atteinte des 8 objectifs du Millénaire pour le Développement dans les autres villages de la Communauté rurale de Léona- Senegal.

donor_name: MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL, FUNDS FOR THE MILLENNIUM PROMISE VILLAGES PROJECT("MV2s"), INITIATED IN PARTNERSHIP WITH COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY'S EARTH INSTITUTE, THE UN MILLENNIUM PRIJECT AND UNDP. outputs.output_descr: The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.
